TextView.android:text:
you are now entering to an activty that tells you at what angle you should throw the object, please read and follow these instructaions: 
 1)put your phone on the arm that you throw with 
 2)hold your phone in that position with your 2nd arm 
 3) when you see a + sign on your phone lift your arm 
 4) when you see a - sign lower your arm 
 5) when you see that your phone's backround color is green stop for a few seconds if it is stil green then throw the object
